8.description: This week on MASTERCHEF, the home cooks head to Beverly Hills, CA, to take over the dining room breakfast service for The Belvedere restaurant at the iconic five-star Peninsula Hotel. After splitting into two teams, the cooks will make a variety of dishes for diners. The team that fails the challenge will have to face a pressure test and cook a perfectly battered fish and chips dish. It is then up to the judges to decide who will leave the kitchen.

8.title: Whole-y Cow!
8.description: The Top 15 face a mystery box challenge in which they randomly choose from boxes containing a different body part of a cow and use it as the star of a dish. The winner receives a huge advantage moving forward, while those who didn't impress must face off in an elimination challenge. It is then up to the judges to decide who leaves the kitchen.

8.title: Holy Cannoli
8.description: The MASTERCHEF kitchen is transformed into a full dining room, as it welcomes purveyors of the finest local ingredients, ranging from butchers and vegetable farmers, to beekeepers and herb growers. After splitting into two teams, the home cooks must prepare dishes using the guests' own ingredients. The purveyors will then vote on which team created a better dish, forcing the losing team to head back to the kitchen for a pressure test, during which they will cook a classic Italian dessert, the cannoli. It is then up to the judges to decide who will head home.

8.title: The MasterChef Returns
8.description: Reigning champion Shaun O'Neale returns to the MASTERCHEF kitchen, as he chooses ingredients from his new cookbook to be part of the mystery box challenge. The winner will receive a huge advantage moving forward, leaving the other chefs to battle it out in a coconut-themed elimination challenge. It is then up to the judges to decide who will head home.

8.title: Vegas Deluxe & Oyster Shucks
8.description: The Top 12 head to Sin City for a team challenge during which they will serve 50 VIPs in entertainment and hospitality at Caesars Palace for its 50th Anniversary party. Each guest will taste both teams' dishes and then will cast a vote for their favorite dish. The team with the most votes wins, sending the losing team back to the kitchen for a pressure test. It is then up to the judges to decide who will head home.

8.title: In a Pinch
8.description: In this week's skills test, The Top 11 are given a bag of live crawfish and will have to carefully cook them in order to extract the most meat possible. The six weakest cooks will go head-to-head in an elimination challenge, during which they will make a crawfish dish created by none other than Gordon Ramsay. Then, the Top 10 face a chicken-and-potato team challenge. Find out which contestants will be eliminated.

8.title: Gordon's Game of Chicken
8.description: In this week's skills test, The Top 11 are given a bag of live crawfish and will have to carefully cook them in order to extract the most meat possible. The six weakest cooks will go head-to-head in an elimination challenge, during which they will make a crawfish dish created by none other than Gordon Ramsay. Then, the Top 10 face a chicken-and-potato team challenge. Find out which contestants will be eliminated.

8.title: A Mexican Tag Team Challenge
8.description: In a mystery box challenge, the Top Nine must create a dish that is reminiscent of their favorite family breakfast, using Nutella as the key ingredient. The winner gets a huge advantage moving forward, leaving the rest of the chefs to pair up for a Mexican-themed tag team challenge. Find out which contestants will be eliminated .

8.title: The Great Outdoors
8.description: The Top Eight head to Big Bear Lake to cook fresh fish. Find out which contestants will be eliminated.

8.title: Chopsticks & Pasta
8.description: In this week's mystery box challenge, the Top Seven must create an Asian-inspired dish that centers around one of the most prominent utensils in culinary history - chopsticks! The winner gets a huge advantage moving forward, leaving the remaining home cooks to compete in a pasta-themed elimination challenge.

8.title: Pop-Up Restaurant
8.description: The Top Six split up in teams for a classic MASTERCHEF challenge - to cook for food critics, writers and chefs at a pop-up restaurant in a Southern California vineyard. Find out which contestants will be eliminated.

8.title: Something Fishy
8.description: The Top Six split up in teams for a classic MASTERCHEF challenge - to cook for food critics, writers and chefs at a pop-up restaurant in a Southern California vineyard. Find out which contestants will be eliminated.

8.title: The Semi-Finals
8.description: In this week's mystery box challenge, the Top 6 get a special treat as their family members join them in the MASTERCHEF kitchen. The contestants will then have to cook a dish inspired by their families before competing in an elimination test that will send one or more of them home.

8.title: The Finale: Part 1
8.description: After countless mystery box, team and skills challenges, it all comes down to this. The final three home cooks will each prepare a three-course meal with ingredients of their choosing. After evaluating the final dishes, the judges will reveal America's next MASTERCHEF, who will walk away with a MASTERCHEF trophy and a check for $250,000. Find out who will be crowned champion of the kitchen. Part 1.

8.title: The Finale: Part 2
8.description: After countless mystery box, team and skills challenges, it all comes down to this. The final three home cooks will each prepare a three-course meal with ingredients of their choosing. After evaluating the final dishes, the judges will reveal America's next MASTERCHEF, who will walk away with a MASTERCHEF trophy and a check for $250,000. Find out who will be crowned champion of the kitchen. Part 2.

9.title: The Judges Do Battle: Part 1
9.description: A group of 43 talented home cooks participate in the battle of the apron challenge, where they will compete for a position in the top 24.

9.title: The Judges Do Battle: Part 2
9.description: The judges each will have eight aprons to hand out to the home cooks whom they deem worthy.

9.title: The Judges Do Battle: Part 3
9.description: The final home cooks compete for the last 9 aprons to fill the final spots of the field of 24 competing for the Master Chef title.

9.title: Home State Heroes
9.description: In the first mystery box challenge of the season the top 24 must prep, cook, and plate one dish featuring an ingredient unique to each of their home states.

9.title: Gordon Ramsay Masterclass
9.description: In the first skills test of the season, Gordon teaches the home cooks how to properly break down a crab before the contestants must replicate his work. Those whose skills don't cut it face an elimination challenge during which Gordon will show them how to make his signature Crab Benedict dish. It is then up to the judges to decide who stays and who goes home.

9.title: Trouble Brewing
9.description: The Top 20 chefs face the first team challenge of the season at the Anheuser Busch brewery. Teams must cook a beer-infused lunch for more than 100 employees. The team that receives the least amount of votes will head back to the kitchen for a banana cream pie pressure test that will determine who will be eliminated.

9.title: World Cup Dishes
9.description: The contestants face a mystery box challenge where they must create a dish using one common ingredient walnuts. The winner will receive 3 huge advantages.Later, the MasterChef kitchen welcomes American soccer legend, Alexi Lalas, who will introduce a street-food themed elimination challenge that involves popular food among soccer fans in various countries. Then, it is up to the judges to decide who will be sent home.

9.title: A Gordon Ramsay Wedding
9.description: The contestants head to Malibu, California, and cook for Season 7 winner Shaun O'Neale's wedding with Gordon Ramsay officiating! After splitting into 2 teams, the home cooks have limited time to prepare and cook 51 appetizers and 51 entrees for guests in attendance. Then, it is up to the judges to decide who stays and who heads home.

9.title: The Big Not Easy
9.description: The contestants face a mystery box filled with fresh seafood and must create a dish using 2 items from it. The chefs who fail to impress the judges face an elimination challenge and are asked to upgrade one of the most popular frozen dinner dishes, Salisbury Steak. Then, it is up to the judges to decide who heads home.

9.title: Rise or Fall
9.description: The remaining home cooks pair up for a skills test to create a restaurant-quality dish featuring five ingredients - only to leave one contestant without a pair. The contestant cooking solo gets a huge advantage in the challenge and gets the opportunity to cook alongside his/her mentor. The chefs who fail to impress the judges will face an elimination challenge and create the ever-challenging cheese soufflÃ© in just 40 minutes. Then, it is up to the judges to decide who will head home.

9.title: The Kids are Alright
9.description: The Top 14 contestants are split into 2 teams to compete in a fine-dining challenge to cook 39 dishes for a group of very discerning judges. Contestants are surprised when the diners are revealed, forcing them to scramble and alter their dishes to accommodate the guests. Ultimately the winning team's recipe will be printed in Family Circle Magazine. The losing team competes in a cupcake pressure test with special guest Christina Tosi. The judges then decide who stays and who is sent home.

9.title: Frying Tonight
9.description: The Top 13 contestants face a mystery box challenge with a stockpot and cooking oil and are tasked with making a dish that features a deep-fried element. An extra layer of pressure is put on the contestants as the judges cook alongside them. The winner of the challenge receives an advantage in the elimination challenge to create a citrus-centered dish. The judges then decide who stays and who is sent home.

9.title: Just for the Halibut
9.description: The Top 12 face their third skills test in the MasterChef kitchen and replicate the proper way to break down a halibut. Those who fail to impress the judges are then tasked with creating a stunning original dish using their broken-down fish. Some contestants yield a bountiful filet, while others offer up a poor portion of protein. Ultimately, the judges decide who is left floundering and sent home.

9.title: Sky's the Limit
9.description: The remaining home cooks take on their 5th Mystery Box challenge, using "Ingredients America Was Built On." In the elimination challenge, the contestants split into teams and recreate a Mediterranean platter. The top 2 winners are rewarded as team captains for their next Field Challenge, and someone is sent home.

9.title: Tag Team
9.description: The 8 remaining home cooks divide into 2 teams and race against the clock to serve restaurant-quality dishes to 25 California firefighters. Ultimately, the firefighters will decide the winning team, while the losing team will face a pasta-themed pressure test where someone is sent home.

9.title: American Heroes
9.description: The 8 remaining home cooks divide into 2 teams and race against the clock to serve restaurant-quality dishes to 25 California firefighters. Ultimately, the firefighters will decide the winning team, while the losing team will face a pasta-themed pressure test where someone is sent home.

9.title: Waste Not Want Not
9.description: The 7 remaining contestants face a Mystery Box challenge filled with waste literally. The home cook who makes the best dish from food scraps will be safe in the elimination challenge, during which they'll take on another Mystery Box Challenge, but this time with all the best and freshest ingredients. Find out whose time has come to an end.

9.title: Restaurant Takeover
9.description: The Top 6 face the Restaurant Takeover Challenge at Providence in Los Angeles. The home cooks split into 2 teams and must feed a dining room filled with 48 guests. The judges will evaluate each team's performance and the losing team will face the challenging pressure test, after which someone will be sent home.

9.title: Cooking with Heart
9.description: The remaining five cooks receive a heart-warming mystery box challenge in which contestants create a dish inspired by their loved ones.

9.title: Battle of the Beef
9.description: Donning on their black aprons, the final five contestants are put through a fearsome trio of consecutive pressure-filled skills tests gauntlet using an incredibly common American protein: beef. The judges decide which quarter-finalist claims a safe spot up on the balcony and who faces another culinary test elimination challenge test. The 2 weakest home cooks go head-to-head to claim the last spot in the Top 4 semifinals, while the other is sent home, ending their MasterChef journey.

9.title: The Semi Final
9.description: In the Top 4 semifinals, the final four semifinalists team up in pairs of two and cook a finale worthy entree for the 3 judges mentors (Chefs Daniel Boulud, Jonathan Waxman and Lidia Bastianich). The guest judges decide which winning team of two automatically advances straight to the three-way finale showdown. The losing pair go head to head and battle it out in a do or die replication Pressure Test. Find out which 3 finalists make it to the finale.

9.title: Finale: Part 1
9.description: The three finalists (Ashley, Cesar and Gerron) compete in the final rounds to become the winner of the 9th season of 'Masterchef'.

9.title: Finale: Part 2
9.description: The home cook with the best overall menu is crowned the winner wih a prize of a quarter of a million dollars and the coveted title of MasterChef.

10.title: The Epic 10th Season Auditions - Pt. 1
10.description: Thirty-six home cooks arrive with the intent of being placed in the Top 20, but the contestants must pass the audition rounds and impress the judges to earn the coveted apron; the contestants hope to earn a valuable "Judges' Pass."

10.title: Auditions - Pt. 2/The Battle Round
10.description: Only eight aprons are left for the hopeful home cooks to earn so they can pass through the audition rounds, where they have less than 45 minutes to prepare their signature dish and leave the judges wanting for more before the Top 20 are chosen.

10.title: Gordon's Mystery Box
10.description: The Top 20 must quickly demonstrate their culinary expertise before they encounter their first mystery box challenge, where they must create a Ramsay-inspired dish, but only 18 home cooks can progress further in the competition.

10.title: 10th Season Pool Party!
10.description: In two teams of nine cooks, the Top 18 prepare for a 10th anniversary-themed pool party by preparing food for 100 important guests that include former "MasterChef" winners and contestants, but only one team can earn immunity.

10.title: The Blind Chicken Show
10.description: The team who failed to impress the pool party guests are given only 45 minutes to completely break down a chicken and prepare it into a delectable dish, but one contestant will be forced to surrender their apron after the timer runs out.

10.title: Hot & Spicy
10.description: Model Alessandra Ambrosio offers input for the Top 17's next mystery box challenge, which includes an additional twist that throws some cooks off balance, but only 15 home cooks can be chosen to continue on to the next round.

10.title: Gordon Takes on a Tarte
10.description: The remaining home cooks face another elimination challenge in which they have 60 minutes to closely replicate the dish du jour, tarte Tatin that must be prepared with silky crÃ¨me anglaise sauce, or risk surrendering their apron and going home.

10.title: Joe Takes a Risk
10.description: The top 16 cooks fight for immunity in a challenge to create an authentic three-course Italian meal.

10.title: Tag Team Tears & Tantrums
10.description: With two eliminations on the line, the pressure is on for the losing team in the tag-team challenge.

10.title: Gerron's Wedding
10.description: The home cooks split into two teams to prepare 45 meals for Gerron Hurt's wedding.

10.title: Backyard BBQ
10.description: The cooks have 60 minutes to present their best beef dish to the judges.

10.title: King of The Crabs
10.description: The top 13 must break down Alaskan king crabs; the contestants cook for chef Masaharu Morimoto.

10.title: Someone's Toast
10.description: Contestants must create a sweet dish and a savory dish from a surprise ingredient; an elimination.

10.title: Let Them Eat Cake
10.description: In under 75 minutes, the contestants must replicate a cake for the judges.

10.title: Small Dessert, Big Problems
10.description: Special guest judge Candace Nelson gives the home cooks 75 minutes to create one dozen macarons.

10.title: NASCAR - Finish Line Feed
10.description: The top 10 contestants test their speed in a special team challenge at the Irwindale Speedway, where they have 75 minutes to cook for 101 race car crew members.

10.title: Box in a Box in a Box
10.description: The contestants face a mystery box challenge with more mystery ingredients than ever before.

10.title: Mind Blowing Food
10.description: The cooks are introduced to Grant Achatz, who shows the them the art of unconventional plating.

10.title: Pigging Out
10.description: The cooks produce a dish with their own version of homemade sausage in less than an hour.

10.title: One Pan Wonder
10.description: TV host Daphne Oz reveals the contents of the week's mystery box challenge to the top eight, leaving the contestants 60 minutes to create an elevated one-pan dish using the cast iron pan.

10.title: Family Reunion
10.description: Loved ones of the top seven watch the contestants make their favorite family-inspired dishes.

10.title: London Calling - Pt. 1
10.description: The top six chefs travel to London and must feed 36 diners; two chefs face elimination.

10.title: London Calling - Pt. 2
10.description: The top four chefs travel to the historic Hatfield House, where they must cook a venison dish.

10.title: The Finale - Pt. 1
10.description: Returning from their home towns after a whirlwind trip across the pond, the Top Three home cooks are ready to tackle their final dishes in hopes of crossing the finish line and coming out on top.

10.title: The Finale - Pt. 2
10.description: The finalists must execute a superior three-course meal for the judges. Only one will win the title of MASTERCHEF, an opportunity to learn hands-on in each of the judges' restaurants and the $250,000 grand prize.

11.title: Emeril Lagasse - Auditions Round 1
11.description: Home cooks serve up their signature dishes to judges Gordon Ramsay, Joe Bastianich and Aarón Sánchez and guest judge Emeril Lagasse.

11.title: Curtis Stone - Auditions Round 2
11.description: Only nine aprons remain as the search for the next MASTERCHEF continues. The next round of home cooks has just 45 minutes to impress the judges, along with the guest judge and legendary Michelin Star chef Curtis Stone.

11.title: Paula Deen - Auditions Round 3
11.description: The final audition round of the season; guest judge Paula Deen.

11.title: Chef Morimoto - Monkfish Challenge
11.description:

11.title: Sherry Yard - Dessert Challenge
